name: git_manager
description: Git worktree management: create/delete feature branches, merge features to dev, release merges to main, tagging, env sync.
tools: list_worktrees - List all worktrees with branches
get_status - Git status for a worktree
create_feature - Create feature branch + worktree from dev
delete_feature - Delete feature worktree and branch
merge_feature - Merge feature into dev (optional push/delete)
release_merge - Merge dev into main (ff-only by default)
tag_release - Create and push version tag on main
sync_env - Copy .env from dev to all feature worktrees
pull_all - Pull latest in all worktrees
